distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for LibVNCServer fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2020-29260: Fixed memory leakage via rfbClientCleanup() (bsc#1203106).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: libvncclient v0.9.13 was discovered to contain a memory leak via the function rfbClientCleanup().
notes.title: CVE description
